description:
Nami attempts to track down some missing treasure, Brook searches the kitchen for a mystery ingredient, and a heroic team effort topples Oars!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Et de un à terre ! Une technique secrète : l’arrimage des chapeaux de paille
